name: Serving Spirits
description:
A poor human has gotten stuck in the otherworld! Now he must serve drinks to the occupants for all eternity(or until he upsets them!)

Instructions:

The ghost will present three items you must use IN ORDER. it will be two liquids and one item. 

click and hold the bottle/item and drag them above the glass as if you were about to pour/place.

If you attempt to pour the liquid or place the item inside the glass and not, it will not work( come on! Your Human!...(but I'm sure ghosts could get away with it!)

Here is the original concept before our lovely artist started pumping out assets =)
